page.title: 10Watersports Centre 2
page.content: More than 100,000 people use the {Holme Pierrepont Watersports Centre each year and 50 people are employed to run the area. The administration buildings are at one end of the course. They provide accommodation for up to 67 residents and have rooms for conferences and seminars. There are also lounges and a dining room. As well as the sailing activities there is a separate water-ski lagoon. It has jumps and can be used for competitions. There are plans to make a canoe slalom course in the park. This would be between the rowing course and the nearby{River Trent.
